long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
# Website Blocker: Boost Your Productivity

Maximize your focus and reclaim your time with Website Blocker, the all-in-one productivity solution for Chrome.

## Key Features:

1. 🚫 Smart Website Blocking: Easily block distracting websites and stay on task.
2. ⏱️ Time Tracking: Gain insights into how you spend your online time.
3. 📊 Activity Visualization: Track your productivity with a GitHub-style activity graph.
4. 🍅 Pomodoro Technique: Built-in timer to help you work in focused intervals.
5. 📅 Customizable Schedules: Set blocking schedules that fit your work routine.
6. 🏆 Streak Tracking: Stay motivated with daily productivity streaks and earn titles.
7. 📝 Task Management: Organize your to-dos and boost your accomplishments.
8. ⚙️ Flexible Profiles: Create multiple blocking profiles for different scenarios.
9. 🔓 Temporary Access: Option for brief access to blocked sites when needed.
10. 📈 Productivity Insights: Get detailed stats on your browsing habits and time saved.

Whether you're a student aiming to ace your exams, a professional looking to minimize distractions, or anyone seeking to cultivate better digital habits, Website Blocker is your perfect productivity companion.

Take control of your online time, boost your focus, and achieve more with Website Blocker. Download now and start your journey to enhanced productivity!

Privacy Note: This extension only accesses the necessary data to provide its core functionality. Your browsing data is stored locally and is never shared or sold.

Tags: Productivity, Focus, Time Management, Website Blocker, Pomodoro Timer, Task Manager
